planning.cook_time: PT40 minutes (for rare), plus 15-20 minutes restingM
planning.total_time: PT55 minutes to an hour, plus marinating overnightM

ingredients.item: 2 medium red chillies, deseeded and finely chopped
1kg piece fillet steak, Aberdeen Angus or British, from the meat service counter
A little olive oil for searing
Finely grated zest and juice of 1 lemon
